parameters: I wish the view were a little greener.
No, the air is still nice.
I lost my favorite jacket. Probably left it on the bus like an idiot.
Would you take mine? I'm plenty warm. Overheating, even.
This was just a horrible time to try some new, untested medication.
I think the side effects are doing really weird stuff to me.
My roommates are driving me insane. There's stuff going on with my family and at my job.
The weeks I work less, I can't even enjoy the time off.
I'm dirt poor. I have no car.
As soon as I manage to cover one expense, some surprise bill comes or something else breaks.
Is where you live a small space?
It's a two bed, one bath. Three people. My roommates are dating.
I mean, kind of. Whatever they are, I'm the third wheel of it.
But they don't clean. They eat all the food. They're loud.
And they hate me. They wish I wasn't there, but they need the rent money.
It's never easy sharing close quarters.
I'm from a big family, so I'm sort of used to it.
\|Although my mom won't talk to me anymore. So that's another thing on the pile.
I feel sorrier for my siblings who still live at home with more of our family.
Now they gotta do the stuff I used to do. Chores, cooking, translating at her appointments...
I kind of bailed on them.
My family is big, too. I just moved out last year.
Yes. I am living alone for the first time in my life.
Hmm...\| I don't want to live alone, but I am a bit jealous.
The house is old, and it's way out in the sticks, but it's mine.
Well, from where I'm standing, it sounds really nice.
My life would need so much fixing that time and time again I have proven I can't do by myself.
I need more help than I can get.
I don’t really have anyone I’m close with in real life right now.
\|I mean, there are people I talk to sometimes.
But when I think, “I don’t have friends,” it just...\| it feels true.
Well, you were invited to spend time with your coworker recently, weren't you?
That could be the start of something good. Right?
There's this guy at my work.
We don't work the same hours.
I never know when he's going to be there or not.
Anyway, he's the one who invited me to his place.
His roommate left as soon as we walked in, which I thought was weird.
\|He started coming on to me the second we were alone.
And I figured, you know, some people do that. They hook up like that.
I don't know. Couple weeks ago.
Since then, I've just avoided him at work. I try not to look at him.
But it's not a big place. He's friends with a lot of the guys in the back.
Even though he doesn't speak Spanish like them and I do, they still \.like \.him \.\.better\..\..\..
He kept trying to talk to me, so I decided to speak with him one on one. \|Alone.
We went out to his car after work.
It was late. It was raining pretty hard that day.
I told him it hurt my f\.f\.\.f\.eelings\.\. that he didn't even bother to hang out with me first.
That it wasn't okay to use people like that.
And I cried, and it was so embarrassing...
He said it was a misunderstanding.
And then he started\| touching me again.
I tried to push him away at first.
I couldn't believe someone would do that.
Angel, have you called the police?
I tried. A few days later. It was humiliating.
The cop showed up three hours after I called.
I couldn't remember the details or the date I went to his place. I never got his address, either.
After I got out of his car, I walked to the bus stop in the rain.
When I got home, I took a scalding hot shower.
Everything you're not supposed to do.
I'll never forget the look on the cop's face. Sighing, exasperated...
Like I was such\.\. a waste\.\. of time.
What, so they can call me a liar?
I'm so stupid, I don't even remember what day I went to his house. I never got his address, either.
After I got out of his car, I walked to the bus stop in the rain.
When I got home, I took a scalding hot shower.
Everything you're not supposed to do.
Angel, I think you need to get away from this man.
I think you should consider it.
Why should I have to quit?
But it's just some shitty minimum wage job. Right?
Anyone can do it, and I'm completely worthless. Right?
Well, I like it better there than the last four places I've been at.
So, what, I haven't suffered enough yet? I should lose my job, too?
Maybe take some time off to put some space between you and him.
My rent is due next week. I can't just not work. That's not an option.
I have ZERO savings. \.\.I have NOTHING. \.\.People like you wouldn't get it.
It was a bad idea to tell this to you. I don't know what I was thinking.
I regret it already. Please, please just forget about it.
